item.title: By: Lee
item.dc:creator: Lee
item.description: <p>Well, actually I'd like to see RSS in the mix. I enjoy your site and perspective of IT & Domino. At the moment I'm playing with RSS readers and am surprised you don't do RSS; it never occured to me before; when I started cleaning my bookmarks I just assumed all the blogs did. Silly me. Still, thanks for the nice reading.</p>
item.content:encoded: Well, actually I’d like to see RSS in the mix. I enjoy your site and perspective of IT & Domino. At the moment I’m playing with RSS readers and am surprised you don’t do RSS; it never occured to me before; when I started cleaning my bookmarks I just assumed all the blogs did. Silly me. Still, thanks for the nice reading.
